entry.title: Marathi Letters from Divine Message, Version 10

link.title: Marathi Letters from Divine Message, Version 10

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We would like to share with you all the up-dated Marathi Letters, from Divine Message Version 10 we have been working on since Divine Message, Version 9.5 was posted on April 24, 2024. The pdf file with 1 full new IAST transliteration is available at the link Version 10.
Total Marathi Letters: 38.
Originals: 25.75 letters.
Retyped or (original) rewritten text: 5.25 letters.
Translations into English or IAST transliteration: all 38 letters, only one having just the IAST transliteration (increased by 1 IAST transliteration).
Translations withouts original or retyped or (original) rewriting: 7.
Versions: almost 4.
Pages pdf file: 135 pages (increased by 1).
[Note: updated file replaced the prior one on 2024-0909.]

Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Marathi Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Divine Message, Version 9.5
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We would like to share with you all the up-dated Database of Transcripts/Quotes we have been working on since Divine Message, Version 9.5 was posted on February 26, 2024. The pdf file Divine Message, Version 9.5 can be downloaded at the link Version 9.5.

Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

For older versions of Divine Message and of other databases, please see Version 9.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Comprehensive Compilations Team (the Divine Message Subteam)

Pages pdf file: 131 pages.
